snippet.title: GAME PARALLEL NEW TRAILER  - 3 things to know
snippet.description:
Take a look at the new screenshots on the game's website:
https://www.parallel-game.com
If desired, add the game to your Steam wishlist. This helps a lot. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1388350/Parallel

Developing this game has been a unique experience and I sincerely thank all the fans of this project. The community here on YouTube, is contributing to the evolution of this game. Thank you very much, I make this game for you, with a lot of love and dedication.

Work continues, now targeting a BETA version. And I didn't forget about consoles, I'll work hard to bring Parallel to all consoles, XBox, Playstation and Nintendo Switch. This is just the beginning.

As always, thanks for your support and I wish you all the best.
